name: Courtyard by Marriott Munchen City Center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009
reviews.text: Booked last minute reservations for several days during Oktoberfest. The rate was affordable and the proximity to the grounds was perfect. The staff at the hotel were pleasant and gave out so much info about where and what to do around Munchen. The rooms were a good size and clean. We are definitely staying here for next year's Oktoberfest!
reviews.title: Great Location for Oktoberfest

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Travelled to Munich for the Christmas market, booked through Expedia, reasonably priced even more so with Nectar points. The hotel is a 5 minute walk from the train station and another 5 minute walk to the city centre. The Hotel was clean, the room spacious, the bathroom lovely and clean, and the breakfast which was included in the price was excellent. We had an evening meal in the hotel which was also very nice, usual hotel prices but that's to be expected. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The weather was freezing cold, lots of snow just added to the Christmas atmosphere. We had a lovely weekend.
reviews.title: GREAT HOTEL, PERFECT LOCATION

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I love my Marriotts, normally stay in Full service Marriotts but on saying that the 'Marriott Courtyard' did not let us down.
reviews.title: Perfect Location an excellent Marriott

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice bar/restaurant excellent food excellent service (apart from selling Pepsi, i hate it)
reviews.title: Very high standard, great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We chose a business studio room, free mini bar (nothing special tho) free internet, breakfast included. also a bigger room, The staff are so accommodating, very nice, professional and very friendly.
reviews.title: Comfortable, quiet hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: My friend and I have just returned from a 3 night stay at the Courtyard Munich City Center. We could not fault any of it. We arrived early but we were able to check in which was so helpful to us. The rooms were of a good size and spotlessly clean. They had a small fridge and a safe. The beds were really comfortable. We ate in the restaurant and the staff there were excellent. Their breakfasts were amazing.
reviews.title: As good as the reviews say!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: I would totally recommend this hotel to anyone. The area was fine and we felt safe on the streets although we were not out late at all. It is well situated for the station and also the main streets and sights. We were lucky to get an amazing deal which made it even nicer!
reviews.title: Great hotel, fantastic location and in a reasonable price

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were 6 friends staying at this hotel. we took two triple rooms. the rooms were not very big but very modern and clean. the hotel staff were very kind and tried to help with everything needed from tourist information to special requests we had. breakfast was rich and tasty.
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: the hotel is perfectly located 5 min. walking from the main rail station and the pedestrian mall (Karl platz & Marian platz). The hotel has its own parking garage but it cost us 16 euro per day.
reviews.title: Couldn't have wanted better

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: We very enjoyed our stay in this hotel !!!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed at the Courtyard on a quick 3-day trip to Munich. As others have mentioned, the location is convenient to the main railway station and central Munich. I wouldn't call the neighborhood charming or even appealing, but it is not dangerous and shouldn't put you off. Service at reception was friendly and efficient. We were assigned a corner room at the rear of the building, away from the street, and with the exception of hearing our neighbor's TV set blaring through the thin walls on the first morning of our stay, it was nice and quiet. The bathroom facilities were very nice indeed, with a great deep soaking tub, perfect for taking a nice hot bath after a day of exploring the city in the winter chill.
reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We did not visit the restaurant for breakfast, as it was not included in our rate. However, we did have dinner there one evening, and enjoyed our meal.
reviews.title: Great base

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we found the hotel to be a good value and well located. It is well worth consideration on your next trip to Munich.
reviews.title: Perfect rooms, lobby not so good

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great base for a trip to Munich. It is standard Marriott Courtyard fare – good bed, well equipped room. We had a room on the inside of the building which faced across towards other rooms – so no view but was very quiet.
reviews.title: Good Hotel in the city center

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Checked in at 11.30 and room was available, which was a bonus. Small but adequate bathroom, tea and coffee making stuff, small empty fridge (which probably had been mini bar but not stocked any longer, in room safe, armchair, older type TV with plenty of channels – 2 in English.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Great Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled with family
reviews.text: My daughter and I booked this hotel via Travelocity for 4 nights. We found the hotel to be very new and modern. The A/C worked great and the twin beds were much wider than standard twins. The location was very near the train station, and a short walk to the city center of Munich. It was a very busy hotel, but not noisy at all. The front desk staff was friendly and helpful, and their English was quite good.
reviews.title: Nice, modern hotel near the train station
Courtyard Munich City Center was fantastic
reviews.text: We stayed at the Courtyard City Centre Munich for a week in July 2007. The hotel was well located near the main station. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfasts were excellent and we also dined there some evenings. The food was reasonably priced and very good. The service also very good. The room itself was very comfortable. Air-conditioned. The beds, pillows & linen were great - not something that is commonly found in Europe. There was also an iron & ironing board, (laundrette was on the next block) as well as tea & coffee making facilities which again are rare luxuries in Europe. I can't recommend this hotel highly enough. MS Perth Western Australia

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Spent one night at this very modern and comfortable hotel in
reviews.title: Modern and Comfortable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled solo
reviews.text: July 2007. We picked this hotel because it was near the train station and we had an early morning train to catch.
reviews.title: Hotel has many positive things

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled on business
reviews.text: This was my first time at this hotel, and I was surprised by the size of the room - it was large by European standards and similar in size to a US room. Very good location near the city center and just a block away from the central train station. Hotel was very modern and clean, but internet access is not free and there's no wifi. The worst thing about this hotel is the shower - there's no shower curtain - instead like many other European hotels, there's only a half glass door. So, after a shower, the entire bathroom floor is wet and on top of this, there's no drain for all this water to go somewhere. On the plus side, the heating system works very well and by morning most of the water was all gone.
reviews.title: Large Rooms, Good Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I also liked that fact that there's a supermarket a few door steps away from the hotel -- perfect for buying drinks on a hot day.
reviews.title: Solid hotel and depending on what your visiting in Munich good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Hotel is located in what seems like the red light district of Munich, however this did not detract from it. It is popular with big tour groups, but then again I assume most hotels in Munich are. Clean hotel, good breakfast which seemed free to all guests, so try this out if you can, and 2 short blocks from Hauptbahnhof station so very convenient from the airport. Train from airport is easy and leaves direct from airport into Hauptbahnhof. I would have liked to have stayed closer in to the city, its about 15min walk from the main hub, but it is handy for its closeness to Hauptbahnhof station but also Augustiner beer hall which is a great experience (minus the tourists of course!)
reviews.title: Great value and good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Only five minutes walk from the main train station, a quick and friendly check in, huge bed in a large bedroom in a quiet location (at the back of the hotel) - whats not to like? A good value upmarket tourist hotel I would say. Great breakfast buffet, very busy at weekends but food was constantly replenished. Handy for trains and trams and the old town is only 10 minutes walk away. Good hairdryer in the room too. Only downside was quality of bedlinen and towels - past their best I would say but other than that I would stay there again. Found a nice Italian restaurant across the road from the hotel called Ca D'oro - run by Italians - good food and good service.
reviews.title: Convenient location - great hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for one night - myself and my grandma. It was a 5 minute walk from the train station - very straightforward walk. The metro from the main station is 1-2 stops from all the main touristy spots. The hotel is clean, with big rooms. Breakfast was an amazing buffet. Hotel staff are very friendly.
reviews.title: Good hotel, ideal location for tourists in Munich.

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Munchen City Hotel Munich
